content.text: I saw a whale while on a boat trip with my family when I was a kid. It was amazing!
That sounds like a great memory! I love whales. They're so majestic.
They are! I've always been fascinated by them. What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to go shopping. I also love to create things. I'm a pretty creative person.
That's great! I love to create things too. What kind of things do you like to create?
I like to paint, draw, and write. I also like to make jewelry.
That's awesome! I love to paint too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
It's not about being good at it. It's about enjoying it.
You're right. Thanks for the reminder.
No problem. What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits. I also like to paint abstract art.
That's great! I love abstract art. It's so open to interpretation.
It is. I like that you can see whatever you want to see in it.
Exactly! It's a great way to express yourself.
Me too! It's so much fun.
